declare @costD int, @costMO int, @objectUnit int, @h_line1 as nvarchar(128), @h_line2 as nvarchar(128), @h_line3 as nvarchar(128), @h_line4 as nvarchar(128) select @objectUnit = case when exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_dtgt_dvcs' and val = '1') then 1 else 0 end select @h_line1 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC097' select @h_line2 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC098' select @h_line3 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC099' select @h_line4 = case when @@language = 'V' then cname else cname2 end from reports where ccode = 'DEC100'
select @costD = val from options where name = 'x_dt_bp' select @costMO = val from options where name = 'x_dt_lsx'
if @objectunit = '1' begin select @costD = x_dt_bp, @costMO = x_dt_lsx from dmdvcskb where ma_dvcs = @$ma_dvcs and status = '1' and (x_dt_bp <> 0 or x_dt_lsx <> 0 or x_dt_sp <> 0) select @costD = isnull(@costD, 0), @costMO = isnull(@costMO, 0) end
select dbo.ff_GetStartDateOfCycle(@$tu_ky, @$tu_nam) as ngay_tu, dbo.ff_GetEndDateOfCycle(@$den_ky, @$den_nam) as ngay_den, @costD as dk1, @costMO as dk2, replace(str(@$tu_ky, 2), ' ', '0') as tu_ky, rtrim(@$tu_nam) as tu_nam, replace(str(@$den_ky, 2), ' ', '0') as den_ky, rtrim(@$den_nam) as den_nam, @h_line1 as h_line1, @h_line2 as h_line2, @h_line3 as h_line3, @h_line4 as h_line4
select * into #$keys from @$keys exec rs_rptCOCardMultiPrintExport @$tu_ky, @$tu_nam, @$den_ky, @$den_nam, '', @$ma_dvcs, @@language, @@userID, @@admin
&ReportMarginQuery; &ReportSign.Report.Query;
